item.title: kerasgenerator v0.0.1 Released!
item.description:
kerasgenerator package is designed to simplify the process of preparing the dataset so it could be properly passed to kerasâ€™ fit, evaluate, or predict on generator functions.

Currently, it is still in a very early development stageâ€“it is even only have 2 functions right now ğŸ˜. But it is my first experience in developing a package, and I really canâ€™t resist to publish it to test some features from devtools, usethis, and pkgdown. To be honest, this is also the sole reason a started this blogâ€“which give me a perfect excuse to try blogdown. I will share some of my experiences in using those package in this blog ğŸ˜„.

At the moment Iâ€™m posting this, Iâ€™m still building some vignettes for kerasgenerator. As soon as it this finished, I will upload the link in the package website. Iâ€™m also developing some other features:

  • Support for generating data from file in specified path
  • Support for incorporating recipes package for data preprocessing
  • Data generator for k-shot learning model fitting

If you interested in the package, please stay tuned on this blog for further post related to this package. Also donâ€™t forget to check the packageâ€™s website and push the star buttons on the package GitHub repository ğŸ˜

Happy new year!
